name: Underdone - Soundtrack
detailed_description:
This is the Underdone soundtrack mostly composed by Vindsvept in "320kbps MP3's" format.
There are 13 tracks so far with more added frequently.

Tracklist:
  • 1. Vindsvept - Chasing the Traitor 1:56
  • 2. Vindsvept - Collision 3:18
  • 3. Vindsvept - Fall of the Leaf 3:07
  • 4. Vindsvept - Farseer 3:07
  • 5. Vindsvept - Forsaken 3:18
  • 6. Vindsvept - Heart of Ice 3:33
  • 7. Vindsvept - Hearthfire 3:16
  • 8. Vindsvept - Lake of Light 3:04
  • 9. Vindsvept - Lost but not Forgotten 2:40
  • 10. Vindsvept - New Hope 1:34
  • 11. Vindsvept - Over the Mountain 3:10
  • 12. Vindsvept - Sanctuary 3:15
  • 13. Vindsvept - Shimmering in the Shallows 3:25
  • 14. Vindsvept - The Undead Horde 1:39
  • 15. Vindsvept - Through the Woods we Ran 3:02
  • 16. Vindsvept - Westward 3:18
  • 17. Vindsvept - What Lies Beyond 3:24
  • 18. Vindsvept - Never Stand Alone ft. Jason Kay (Bonus Track) 3:23

The soundtrack will be installed to "steamapps\common\Underdone\soundtrack\soundtrack_mp3"

short_description: This is the Underdone Soundtrack by Vindsvept. There are 13 tracks so far with more added frequently. (in both FLAC and mp3 formats)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
